title: AI Melania: First lady rolls out audiobook of first memoir in Spanish

title: Amazon unveils new AI chip in battle against Nvidia
description: Amazon Web Services launched its in-house-built Trainium3 AI chip on Tuesday, marking a significant push to compete with Nvidia in the lucrative market for artificial intelligence computing power. The move intensifies competition in the AI chip market, where Nvidia currently dominates with an estimated 80- to 90-percent market share for…
content:

title: Vultr to invest $1 billion in Ohio AI cluster using AMD chips
description: Cloud infrastructure company Vultr said on Tuesday it would invest more than $1 billion to launch a new artificial intelligence cluster powered by Advanced Micro Devices' processors at a new data center in Springfield, Ohio.
content:
The new cluster is a 50-megawatt, 24,000-chip facility that will deploy AMD's Instinct MI355X graphics processing units, which will be interconnected with ethernet-based fabric that improves data transfer speed and traffic flow.

title: Is college worth the cost? A majority of Americans say no
description: Americans' changing outlook on higher education comes amid rising tuition costs and growing concerns about artificial intelligence.
content:
Most Americans no longer hold the optimistic view of higher education they once did.
A new poll published by NBC News found nearly two-thirds of Americans (63%) believe a four-year college degree is "not worth the cost because people often graduate w... [3072 chars]

title: This is how holiday shoppers are trying AI for better choices and prices
description: Major retail chains and tech companies are offering new or updated artificial intelligence tools in time for the holiday shopping season
content:
Major retail chains and tech companies are offering new or updated artificial intelligence tools in time for the holiday shopping season, hoping to give consumers an easier gift-buying experience and themselves an augmented share of online spending.

title: Apple shakes up AI team as exec John Giannandrea steps down
description: Apple’s artificial intelligence chief John Giannandrea is stepping down from his role as part of a major shakeup of the troubled division, the company announced late Monday.
content:
Apple’s longtime artificial intelligence chief is leaving as the iPhone maker and its Siri voice assistant scramble to play catchup with AI rivals, the company said.

title: Anthropic acquires developer tool startup Bun to scale AI coding
description: Artificial intelligence startup Anthropic said on Tuesday it has acquired Bun, which helps developers run and manage codes more effectively, as the Claude maker looks to boost the speed and stability of its coding agent.
content:
Dec 2 (Reuters) - Artificial intelligence startup Anthropic said on Tuesday it has acquired Bun, which helps developers run and manage codes more effectively, as the Claude maker looks to boost the speed and stability of its coding agent.
